Reviews.Title: Easy to use.
Reviews.Author: Grandma
Reviews.Content: It's not a DSLR, but the next best thing that can be used easily by anyone in our office. Can be used as point-and-shoot as soon as batter is charged.

Reviews.Title: Lumix
Reviews.Author: Mary Z.
Reviews.Content: This camera is easy to use and understand.  I had a different camera with the same capabilities, but was not so user friendly.

ProductInfo.Features:
16.1MP High Sensitivity MOS Sensor
LSI Venus Engine Image Processor
Leica DC Vario-Elmarit 24x Zoom Lens
25-600mm Optical Zoom Lens (Equivalent)
3.0" 460,000-dot Intelligent LCD Display
ProductInfo.Name: Panasonic Lumix DMC-FZ60K 16.1 MP Digital Camera with 24x Optical Zoom - Black. Includes: 8GB Memory Card, High Speed Memory Card Reader, Extended Life Replacememnt Battery, Table Top Tripod, LCD Screen Protectors, Cleaning Kit & Carrying Case
